answers.answer: Is their blood ur urine? Sounds like a bladder infection..you can go to after hours clinic for that
Word if it's in the urine it's prob bladder or kidney infection. If its from your uterus it's something else
I didnt pee it was just a lil bit of blood
It's prob just a burst vessel in your cervix. Was it light red or what color
It was mostly light red but a lil dark red
Hmmm of there's no pain I wouldn't be concerned but you can call labor and delivery and ask a nurse What her opinion is
I would call your Dr and just ask him what he thinks you should do its probably no big deal but better to be safe. Good luck!

I had this same thing happen just two days ago and it turned out I had a bladder infection mixed with a vaginitis infection. Both can be treated with medicine safe during pregnancy so it's best to get checked out:)

I called the er and talkied to someone and she told me that I should be good and to let the doctor know when I go in at 9 15 for that diabetes test ...thank you for yalls advice (: I was so scared it took so long to happen and I don't want to loose my lil man

question: I went to pee and a lil bit of blood came out do I need to go to the er or is this normal? I'm 28wks and 5 days
title: should i go to the er?
